subject: Playoff Games
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Tim Duncan scored 27 points, and the host San Antonio Spurs took advantage of Serge Ibaka’s absence to dominate the paint, beating the Oklahoma City Thunder in the Western Conference finals opener.
snippet: Tim Duncan scored 27 points, and the host San Antonio Spurs took advantage of Serge Ibaka’s absence to dominate the paint, beating the Oklahoma City Thunder in the Western Conference finals opener.
